roleset.name: provide with equipment
roleset.note: OUTFIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outfit' based on sentences in wsj, comparison with 'equip'; nominal 'outfitting' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls being_dressed-41.3.3, equip-13.4.2-1. (from outfit.01-v)
OUTFITTING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from outfitting.01-n)

example.name: pretty easy
example.text: [Allied-Signal Aerospace Co.]-1 received a $65 million contract *trace*-1 to outfit Continental Airlines' 393 planes with the Bendix/King Traffic Alert and Collision Avoidance System.
example.arg: with the Bendix/King Traffic Alert and Collision Avoidance System

example.name: nominal rel: outfitting
example.text: The conflict between the time required for research and development and the level of urgency for equipment outfitting needs should be made clear .
